Rule Radio.GoGoGobalkan_chaser1
{
	criteria TLK_Radio.GoGoGo Isbalkan_chaser1 IsTalkbalkan_chaser1
	ApplyContext "Talkbalkan_chaser1:1:1"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response Radio.GoGoGobalkan_chaser1
}

Rule NiceShotCommanderbalkan_chaser1
{
	criteria TLK_NiceShotCommander Isbalkan_chaser1 IsTalkbalkan_chaser1
	ApplyContext "Talkbalkan_chaser1:1:1"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response NiceShotbalkan_chaser1
}

Rule NiceShotSirbalkan_chaser1
{
	criteria TLK_NiceShotSir Isbalkan_chaser1 IsTalkbalkan_chaser1
	ApplyContext "Talkbalkan_chaser1:1:1"
	applycontexttoworld
	Response NiceShotbalkan_chaser1
}
